name: fulldls.com soup-up
description:
I think i checked everything...excuse me for using a background i've used b4,but i do like it.Just took away footer and ads,and shifted a few things about.Also prettyfied colours and fonts.Hope u dig it.Comments welcome(as long as they're not nasty obviously).Am still learning,so tips welcome

Thanx to FrostyC for the logo...
